content:
HEALTH EQUITY & DISPARITIES
IN A 21st CENTURY PANDEMIC
Apr 26, 2021 - Due date for extended abstract
May 12, 2021 - Author notifications on extended abstracts
Jun 01, 2021 - Accepted extended abstract submissions posted to the open access repository
Jun 21, 2021 - Day 1 of Virtual Symposium, 9:00am-12noon EST
Jun 28, 2021 - Day 2 of Virtual Symposium, 9:00am-12noon EST
Sep 15, 2021 - Due date for full chapter
Sep 20, 2021 - Chapter submissions posted to the open access repository
Sep 20, 2021 - Chapter peer review process begins
Jan 15, 2022 - Due date for final chapters with revisions
Feb 01, 2022 - Final chapters posted to repository
Feb 15, 2022 - Full collection available on open access repository
